data.message: Hey wanna quit shoving messenger down our throats?

replies.message: Hi Nick. We're committed to providing a fast, reliable and fun messaging product, and we feel confident that Messenger is the way to do this going forward. We hope you'll try it and tell us what you think: http://on.fb.me/1tWy6Cr -Natalie
Yeah you can provide without forcing
Facebook I love it!!!!  Messenger is awesome!  People need to quit being so paranoid! ;-)
It's annoying to be forced to download an app. Where did I say I was paranoid? You select what you want to see. Hi biased, I'm Nick.

Becky, the most common complaint is that it's bad design. Why break a product that already does both "Facebook" and "messaging" very well into two different products? Because of this, you now have less space on your phone and have the added hassle of the phone having to switch apps just to send a message. 

It's bad design, plain and simple.
I never wanted to switch back and forth before...still don't. No more messenger I guess.
